about_markdown: The Refinery Platform is a project of the [Park Lab] (https://compbio.hms.harvard.edu/index) and [Gehlenborg Lab] (http://gehlenborglab.org/) at Harvard Medical School in collaboration with the [Hide Lab] (https://hidelab.wordpress.com/) at Harvard School of Public Health.
intro_markdown: The Refinery Platform is a web-based data visualization and analysis system powered by an ISA-Tab-compatible data repository for public and private data sets. Analyses are implemented as Galaxy workflows and executed through the Galaxy API.

site_videos.caption: Trace a data set's analysis history
Visualize analysis results in interactive environments
Analyze data via pre-built bioinformatic workflows
